import React from 'react'; const About = () => { return (

About Me

Hi, I'm Rahul Ranjan, an AWS DevOps Engineer with 8+ years of hands-on experience in Cloud Computing and DevOps.

Expertise:

  • Proficient in Linux, AWS, DevOps tools, Python, Jenkins, Terraform, Kubernetes, and EKS.
  • Specializes in designing scalable cloud solutions, implementing CI/CD pipelines, and managing containerized applications.

Teaching Philosophy:

  • Passionate about simplifying complex concepts for learners.
  • Focus on hands-on training with real-world scenarios.

Achievements:

  • Trained 100+ students and professionals, helping them excel in Cloud and DevOps roles.
  • Mentored multiple students to achieve certifications like AWS Certified Solutions Architect and Kubernetes Administrator.
); }; const styles = { container: { width: '100%', minHeight: '100vh', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', }, blueSection: { width: '100%', padding: '40px 20px', backgroundColor: '#1e3a8a', // Dark blue background color: '#ffffff', // White text textAlign: 'left', }, whiteSection: { width: '100%', padding: '40px 20px', backgroundColor: '#ffffff', // White background color: '#000000', // Black text textAlign: 'left', }, }; export default About;
